winner.guidelines: This text should be short and concise, announcing the winner of the game. It should be neutral and celebratory.

draw.guidelines: This text should be short and concise, announcing a draw in the game. It should be neutral and informative.
draw.content: It's a draw! No one wins this round.

nextPlayer.guidelines: This text should be short and concise, indicating whose turn it is to play. It should be neutral and informative.

startNewGame.guidelines: This text should be short and concise, indicating the option to start a new game. It should be neutral and inviting.

mainHeading.guidelines: This text should be 1-4 words, acting as the main heading for the page. It should be catchy and relevant to the game of TicTacToe.

subHeading.guidelines: This text should be 30-50 words, acting as a page description. It should be informative and relevant to the game of TicTacToe.
subHeading.content: Experience the ultimate game of TicTacToe. Challenge your friends, test your strategy, and enjoy the classic game in a new, digital format. Who will be the TicTacTotality champion?

imageAltTag.guidelines: This text should be a detailed alt text for the image, containing the keywords '4K photo shoot' and the dimensions width: 1600px and height: 1400px. It should be descriptive and informative.
imageAltTag.content: 4K photo shoot of a TicTacToe game in progress, image dimensions width: 1600px and height: 1400px.
